welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Great Cornard, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its picturesque countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to immerse yourself in our quaint town and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Wethersfield Airport, where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wethersfield Airport handles all freight and cargo operations, serving as a hub for transporting goods to and from the United Kingdom.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
